train(params, agent, env, best_params=None, blockage_qn_net=None)[source]

Modified training function to include the logic for stopping the training process when the stabilization point is reached.

Parameters: - params (dict): Hyperparameters for training. - agent: The agent to be trained. - env: The environment in which the agent operates.

Returns: - Multiple values including lists that track various metrics through training.
